tool.name: OpenSwathChromatogramExtractor
tool.description: Extract chromatograms (XIC) from a MS2 map file.
tool.command:
OpenSwathChromatogramExtractor
-in #for token in $param_in: $token #end for #if $param_tr: -tr $param_tr #end if #if $param_rt_norm: -rt_norm $param_rt_norm #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_min_upper_edge_dist: -min_upper_edge_dist $param_min_upper_edge_dist #end if #if $param_mz_window: -mz_window $param_mz_window #end if #if $param_rt_window: -rt_window $param_rt_window #end if #if $param_is_swath: -is_swath #if " " in str($param_is_swath): "$param_is_swath" #else $param_is_swath #end if #end if #if $param_ppm: -ppm #if " " in str($param_ppm): "$param_ppm" #else $param_ppm #end if #end if #if $param_extract_MS1: -extract_MS1 #if " " in str($param_extract_MS1): "$param_extract_MS1" #else $param_extract_MS1 #end if #end if #if $param_extraction_function: -extraction_function #if " " in str($param_extraction_function): "$param_extraction_function" #else $param_extraction_function #end if #end if #if $param_model_type: -model:type #if " " in str($param_model_type): "$param_model_type" #else $param_model_type #end if #end if #if $param_model_symmetric_regression: -model:symmetric_regression #if " " in str($param_model_symmetric_regression): "$param_model_symmetric_regression" #else $param_model_symmetric_regression #end if #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_force): "$adv_opts.param_force" #else $adv_opts.param_force #end if #end if #end if

param.name: param_rt_norm
param.label: RT normalization file (how to map the RTs of this run to the ones stored in the library)

param.name: param_min_upper_edge_dist
param.label: Minimal distance to the edge to still consider a precursor, in Thomson

param.name: param_mz_window
param.label: Extraction window in m/z dimension (in Thomson, to use ppm see -ppm flag). This is the full window size,
param.help: (-mz_window) e.g. 100 ppm would extract 50 ppm on either side

param.name: param_rt_window
param.label: Extraction window in RT dimension (-1 means extract over the whole range). This is the full window size,
param.help: (-rt_window) e.g. a value of 1000 seconds would extract 500 seconds on either side

param.name: param_is_swath
param.label: Set this flag if the data is SWATH data

param.name: param_extract_MS1
param.label: Extract the MS1 transitions based on the precursor values in the TraML file

param.name: param_extraction_function
param.label: Function used to extract the signal

param.name: param_model_symmetric_regression
param.label: Only for 'linear' model: Perform linear regression on 'y - x' vs

tool.help:
Extract chromatograms (XIC) from a MS2 map file.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_OpenSwathChromatogramExtractor.html
